comment._content: A beautiful portrait. Thanks for making it available to the public.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: She was married to Yasuo Kuniyoshi (September 1, 1893 - May 14, 1953) an American painter, photographer and printmaker born in Okayama, Japan. He migrated to America in 1906, a year later began studying at the Los Angeles School of Art and Design. In 1935 he was awarded the Guggenheim Fellowship. He was known for his still-life paintings of common objects, female circus performers and nudes. He died in New York City. Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yasuo_Kuniyoshi
